title: 08/10/2021 - HOUR 1 - Allen, Wilson, Seahawks, Clippers
itunes:title: 08/10/2021 - HOUR 1 - Allen, Wilson, Seahawks, Clippers
description:
The path of Josh Allen and why he got his mega deal

Zach Wilson is struggling already for the Jets

Russell Wilson is butting heads with the Seahawks again

Kawhi Leonard is staying with the Clippers


Guest: Peter Schrager
